> [[ UI Messenger – Nel ]]

> [[ Nel ]]: lmk if you're online later!

Nel, Smith, and Vision are offline.

Aelriss, Ayla, Donnel, and Tatsumaki are online.

It looks like Liza rescinded her contact request after she saved you.

You enter the purple tent across the road, and are greeted with thick smoke and a familiar heady scent. A familiar NPC sits behind a table with a crystal ball atop it; their features are obscured by the hood of a large robe, with a pair of faintly glowing feline eyes staring at you from the dark.

"Hello, child. Are you lost again?” They ask. “I see, and reveal.”

> [[ Identify a weapon or artifact - 10# ]]
> [[ Ask for a consultation - 25# ]]
> [[ Ask for a prophecy - 1000# ]]
> No thanks. Head somewhere else.
name: BSO
